BIO

My name is Arief Satria Nugraha, I am 19 years old. I was born in Sukabumi on October 19, 1999. I am an only child or I can say that it is the only child from Zaenal Muslihat,SE and Yulviana Ratman. I am a native of Sukabumi, my father is a native of Sukabumi and my mother is a Jakarta person. My dreams are good and happy my parents and my family
